text: @realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX As of today, more U.S. citizens have died because of COVID-19 in the last 2 months than died in the 11-year Vietnam war. 59,266 vs. 58,220. Trump failed the American people and continues to gaslight and spread a false narrative.
